1662150.name: Ardent Azur
1662150.description:
Ardent Azur is a fresh take on the tactical turn-based genre.

Assemble your squad, lead the way battle after battle, and hone your skills as a commander.

A New Spin on a Classical Genre

◘ Dynamic Orders - At the beginning of every turn, choose between five different orders to turn the tide of the battle. Charge, defend, explore, retreat, or use your own commander’s special order to outsmart your opponent.

◘ Limited Movement - All your units can’t be moved every turn. Just like on a real battlefield, you'll need to make every move count and carefully weigh your priorities.

◘ Special Power Moves - Every commander have their unique abilities. Use them wisely to out-power your opponent and swing the battle in a matter of seconds.

A Complete Roster

◘ 13 Original Characters - Meet a distinctive cast of commanders, each with their own abilities, personalities, and motivations. Discover their stories in the rich, narrative-driven campaign.

◘ 3 Factions - Choose between the technology-advanced Unibal, the populist Kori, or the tribal Zutan and their unique units to battle your friends in versus mode.

◘ 18 Units - From the common troops to the unique faction-specific units, get the perfect draft to battle your way to victory.

A Vibrant Campaign

◘ Follow Azur Lionswill - Step in as Azur, a promising commander in Unibal’s army, travel the continent and live through his doubts, success and hardships to discover what’s lurking behind these growing tensions.

◘ Welcome to Hirendir - After the Great Divide that brought peace to the Hirendir continent, everything seemed fine, but it never lasts. As conflict brews, uncover the forces pulling the strings behind the scenes.

◘ 15+ Hours of Content - Battle through 20 missions, improve your skills as a commander and get to the roots of the emerging conflict.


◘ Wishlist now and follow us to not miss any updates! ◘
